2:
For your arrows pierce me,
\q and your hand presses me down.
4:
For my iniquities overwhelm me;
\q they are a burden too heavy for me.
5:
My wounds are infected and smell
\q because of my foolish sins.
\q
6:
I am stooped over and humiliated every day;
\q I go about mourning all day long.
8:
I am numb and utterly crushed;
\q I groan because of the anguish of my heart.
9:
Lord, you understand my heart's deepest yearnings,
\q and my groanings are not hidden from you.
\q
10:
My heart pounds, my strength fades,
\q and my eyesight dims.
12:
Those who seek my life lay snares for me.
\q They who seek my harm speak destructive words
\q and say deceitful words all day long.
14:
I am like a man who does not hear
\q and who has no reply.
16:
I say this so that my enemies will not gloat over me.
\q If my foot slips, they will do terrible things to me.
17:
For I am about to stumble,
\q and I am in constant pain.
\q
18:
I confess my guilt;
\q I am concerned about my sin.
20:
They repay me evil for good;
\q they hurl accusations at me although I have pursued what is good.
22:
Come quickly to help me,
\q Lord, my salvation.
38:
\m
\d A psalm of David, to bring to remembrance.
\q
